entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to by Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is explaining the prophecy to Harry.

entities.name: sibyll
entities.description: The one who made the prophecy.

entities.name: neville longbottom
entities.description: A wizard boy who was also born at the end of July and had parents in the Order of the Phoenix.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story.

relationships.description: Sibyll made a prophecy that could have applied to Harry.
Voldemort attacked Dumbledore, but he narrowly escaped.
Voldemort tried to kill Harry because he knew Harry was the one Sibyll was referring to in her prophecy.
